articles.description: Rachel Evagelou was 48 when she went to get screened for breast cancer, thanks to a friend's post urging women to get checked on Facebook. Her diagnosis was a "huge shock", and she now wants to make sure other women don't delay.
articles.content:
Rachel Evagelou's aggressive, stage-three breast cancer diagnosis came as a "huge shock" because the 48-year-old believed she was still a couple of years shy of having to get a mammogram.
The mother… [+5236 chars]
